articles.title: Surgery, Radioactive Iodine for Hyperthyroidism Up Survival - Medscape
articles.description: In large cohort study, both radioactive iodine and thyroidectomy extended longevity compared with antithyroid medications, while surgery raised the risk for weight gain.
